title: Hypsolebias magnificus
text:
Hypsolebias magnificus is a species of <a href="killifish">killifish</a> in the <a href="Family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Rivulidae">Rivulidae</a> native the Middle <a href="S%C3%A3o%20Francisco%20River">São Francisco River</a> basin in Brazil. It grows to <a href="Fish%20measurement">TL</a>.
It was formerly included in the genus "<a href="Simpsonichthys">Simpsonichthys</a>" but has been recently reclassified.
